caption.title: Mice have high serum viremia early during infection.
caption.p: ( A) Viral titers in the blood of young vs. adult mice receiving 10 5 PFU of ZIKV at days two, four, and six PI. ( B) Viral titers in the blood of mice receiving different doses of ZIKV at days two, four, and six PI. Symbols indicate the mean value between individual mice (n = 3 for young mice and n = 6 for adult mice) Â± standard deviation.
